title: Lil Blood on Oakland, Pimp Culture, Calls No Jumper Out for Messiness & More
description:
Lil Blood talks about the bay, his music, his podcast, street politics, Flakko, and more.

-----
00:00 Intro
5:04 - Going to Youth authority from 14-18, educating himself
8:20 - Starting music on accident, high school not working for him, having ADHD, not being able to concentrate
12:35 - Northern California being born and raised in p**_ culture
20:31 - Music helping him get out the streets, calling No Jumper out for promoting bullsh*t and messiness
24:09 - Not asking messy questions in his interviews, wanting a different type of viral moment
27:45 - Knowing Flakko was going to get spat on in an interview with 16 before it happened
32:20 - Starting Lil Blood tv, not letting music passion go but falling in love with the interviews
37:42 - Relationship with Mozzy, being his bro beyond music
44:25 - Not being responsible for other grown men financially
51:12 - Being grateful for T Rell interviewing the hood
54:20 - Always being viral with his music, going crazy on TikTok
56:03 - Relationship with Ghazi, Ghazi telling him he’s doper than all these rappers
59:55 - Interviewing people off the top of his head with no notes, want Joe Rogan's money
1:04:09 - Top 10 artists in the Bay right now
1:06:33 - Addressing ppl view Flakko as a cornball, finding out he’s from North Dakota
1:09:36 - How having real conversations can save people
1:11:01 - Lil Blood the family man, his 7 yr old son Sirmi Lorde
1:16:25 - “Book Of Dawa” out now!

-----

NO JUMPER PATREON
http://www.patreon.com/nojumper
